inlinecomments-desc: Allow adding comments to a page
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-title: Title of the page to add a comment to. Use this or pageid but not both.
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-pageid: ID of the page to add a comment to. Use this or title but not both.
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-contain: Name of element that is the common ancestor of selected text.
apihelp-inlinecomments-add-param-skipcou: Skip the first n pieces of text that match this.
inlinecomments-missingpage: Could not edit comments as page does not exist.
inlinecomments-noitembyid: Cannot mark comment as resolved as it does not exist.
inlinecomments-addcomment-noitembyid: Cannot reply to comment as it does not exist.
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-param-ti: Title of the page to add a reply to. Use this or pageid but not both.
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-param-pa: ID of the page to add a reply to. Use this or title but not both.
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-param-id: ID of the comment you are replying to
apihelp-inlinecomments-addreply-summary: Add a reply to an inline comment
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-summary: Mark an inline comment resolved and remove from page
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-param-tit: Title of the page to resolve a comment on. Use this or pageid but not both.
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-param-pag: ID of the page to resolve a comment on. Use this or title but not both.
apihelp-inlinecomments-resolve-param-id: ID of the comment you are resolving
inlinecomments-editsummary-autoresolve: Automatically resolving {{PLURAL:$1|a comment after the text it was linked to was removed by $2|$1 comments after the text they were linked to were removed by $2}}.
inlinecomments-error-notext: Warning: Error finding highlighted text. Reload page to verify that correct text was annotated.
